Key Match Events: Utah Jazz erased a double-digit deficit in the fourth quarter and tied it at 116 on Kessler’s tip-in with 2:48 left.
Santi Aldama scored back-to-back baskets to put the Grizzlies in front for good.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ja Morant had 22 points, 10 assists and five rebounds in his return to action.
Santi Aldama scored 27 points and Desmond Bane added 24 more for the Grizzlies.
Lauri Markkanen had 35 points and nine rebounds for Utah.
Others: The Jazz committed 16 turnovers, leading to 22 points for Memphis, in the first three quarters.
Taylor Hendricks and Markkanen combined for two baskets and four free throws in a 17-3 run to set up a tight finish.
Jay Huff had 13 points on 4-of-6 shooting, marking just the fourth time in his NBA career – and the first time in two seasons – that he's scored in the double digits.
